title: Trump’s addiction initiative brings bold rhetoric but few details
description: The White House unveiled a new effort to streamline the country’s response to its drug and alcohol epidemic. But the announcement was light on details.
content: The White House unveiled a new effort to streamline the country’s response to its drug and alcohol epidemic. But the announcement was light on details.
